title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: Systematic Approaches for Elementary Mathematics Education Curation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply a system to evaluate the credibility of elementary math educational materials across various digital platforms
Learners can design a personalized math content curation system in a VR-based simulation environment.
Learners can develop a collaborative curation model incorporating peer feedback through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
